alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:23PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Dorchester County through 230 PM EDT... At 122 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms near University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies, or near Cambridge. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies around 215 PM EDT. Cambridge around 230 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Madison, Woolford, Andrews, Church Creek, Bucktown, Linkwood and Lloyds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
